name: VNRecognizedPointsObservation
desc: An observation that provides the points the analysis recognized.

items.name: var availableKeys: [VNRecognizedPointKey]
items.desc: The available point keys in the observation.

items.name: var availableGroupKeys: [VNRecognizedPointGroupKey]
items.desc: The available point group keys in the observation.

items.name: func recognizedPoint(forKey: VNRecognizedPointKey) -> VNRecognizedPoint
items.desc: Retrieves a recognized point for a key.

items.name: func recognizedPoints(forGroupKey: VNRecognizedPointGroupKey) -> [VNRecognizedPointKey : VNRecognizedPoint]
items.desc: Retrieves the recognized points for a key.

items.name: func keypointsMultiArray() -> MLMultiArray
items.desc: Retrieves the grouping of normalized point coordinates and confidence scores in a format compatible with Core ML.
